00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/variant/variant.hpp"
00012 
00013 namespace hope{
00014 
00015     template <typename ... Ts>
00016     template <typename T>
00017     variant<Ts...>::variant(T&& type)
00018     {
00019         static_assert(contains<T>(type_list<Ts...>{}));
00020         m_storage.template initialize<T>(std::forward<T>(type));
00021     }
00022 
00023     template <typename ... Ts>
00024     template <typename T>
00025     variant<Ts...>& variant<Ts...>::operator=(T&& value)
00026     {
00027         m_storage.set(std::forward<T>(value));
00028         return *this;
00029     }
00030 
00031     template <typename ... Ts>
00032     template <typename T>
00033     T& variant<Ts...>::get()
00034     {
00035         return m_storage.template get<T>();
00036     }
00037 
00038 }
